info.title: SwiftKanban
info.description: SwiftKanban is a Visual Work Management Tool for helping users manage their work effectively by leveraging the simple yet powerful principles of the Kanban Methodology. Use SwiftKanban connector to add/modify cards with the data from rest of your ecosystem.

get.description: This operation is used to retrieve a specific card details for a given card ID
This operation is used to retrieve a list of all accessible projects for your SwiftKanban instance

get.summary: Get Team Members details in a board
get.description: This operation is used to retrieve a detailed list of all users associated with a SwiftKanban board.

post.description: This operation is used to add a comment to an existing SwiftKanban card

get.summary: Get all the card types available in a board
get.description: This operation is used to retrieve a list of cardTypes for your SwiftKanban board.

post.description: This operation is used to add card in the Backlog or the custom column as defined in the Board Policies

put.description: This operation is used to update a specific card for for a given card ID
This operation is used to archive a specific card for a given card ID.
This operation is used to discard or abort a specific card for a given card ID

get.summary: Get details of queues and sub-queues
get.description: This operation is used to fetch Lane details along with queues and subqueues

put.description: This operation is used to move a card to backlog
